title: I like my women, how I like my mace;
body:
#T H I C C

http://imgur.com/8cATUv0
http://imgur.com/vwTmE2s

replies.body:
i like my women how i like my weapons

R E S P E C T E D

I hate women:

H - respect
A - them
T - all the time
E -

I wouldn't consider that thicc.

~~I'm not denying that I've got a thing for her though~~
Yeah, THICC is losing its meaning, somehow. Soon, people will say Taliyah is THICC
Fiddlesticks is too thicc.

*Fiddlesticks is too S T I C C

Fixed it for you
F I D D L E S T I C C

This. The only requisite for being "THICC" now is just to have visible thighs that aren't twigs. People are basically using it now to say they think a girl is hot. 

I wish this stupid fucking meme would die already.

Agreed.

At least MF has those thicc hips, like Sona.
that's like the first released female skin without disproportions since a long time
Is that your way of saying you approve?

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

you know me very well

Kayle's always been a very non-sexualized champion in design. It's what I love about her.

 No reliance on sex appeal but just a focus on strength, confidence, duty and justice.

She's still hot as fuck though. >:)
i was going to say leona was like that but pool party is a thing...
pool party leona is also arguably the least sexualized of all pool party skins. Hell, I'd argue it proves they're dedicated to keeping her non-sexualized.
Well, if you get the Blue Pool Party Leona Chroma (Dawn Azure), her skirt turns slightly more see-through. ;)

Regarding Leona, there's praising

http://i.imgur.com/CNr74By.jpg

...and then there's worshipping

http://new1.fjcdn.com/comments/Praise+it+_29e0371299a3f04eb5448518a6404485.jpg

It's important to differenciate between the two. ;)

Downvoted?
Someone doesn't know their 420 praise it meme... :/

http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5h3tzbgRw1rocz01.jpg

This IS M&G after all. >-<
How dare women wear bathing suits?!
"Yeah, when they look so much better without it!"

>Kayle's always been a very non-sexualized champion in design. 

Except most of her skins have a boobplate.

Women have breasts. Armor comes with breastplates. What are the odds?

At least her chest is fully covered in all of them, no cleavage, barely any skin, just her armor/Riot suit.

Well, "boob plates" are highly ineffective when it comes to actually being good protection.

It's just a silly stylistic choice.
Just like Mordekaiser's overly spiky armor.

Let's face it.

He still has pizza feet.
And the pizza feet.
There is nothing silly about wanting to intimidate your enemies before impaling them on you, and wearing them like trophies.

I said "boobplate".

http://www.twirlit.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/boob-plate-armor-skyrim.jpg

Not "breastplate".

http://cdn.ecommercedns.uk/files/9/210639/3/1982863/female-upper-body-armour-set-5.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/f7FdEdG.jpg?nodirect

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eF-5ryUHAHA

http://www.tor.com/2013/05/06/boob-plate-armor-would-kill-you/

*To be fair,* having a couple lumps that form an indent on your breastplate may not be the best thing to have if you want to deflect blows away from your chest and keep the breastplate from caving in. That is, it's probably not entirely practical.

That said, I imagine Kayle's armor is more decorative/ceremonial than for protection. Practicality doesn't really matters that much in a fictional fantasy video game anyway. Particularly one where the lady in boobplate has a giant sword and angel magic.

It's only practical if they don't converge in the middle, otherwise the force of a blow would be focused there.

That armor would actually aid in breaking the sternum, not protect it.

Kayle's base armor (and those chroma-tier skins) is passable in-game (while the boobplate is there the space between is actually covered). Splash art, not so much.
Username checks out.

She's actually pretty average tbh. 
If anything she's lean.
http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/images/img_0391_7.PNG

While playing urgot the other day (post rework) I legit said after grinding the enemy caitlyn.
"i like my caitlyn like i like my pizza, boneless."
~~Even i wanted to kill myself after that.~~
Who is that?

> [{quoted}](name=Oppy Poppy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0EJsLx1R,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-07-29T22:51:21.635+0000)
>
> Who is that?

The bottom one?
It's the skin of Morde.
Rookie mistake, since not many people see him.
And the top one is a close up of Pentakill Kayle
Oh

Thoughy you were gonna call the mace horny instead of spiky and call it a day.

Heck, let me change the joke:

I like my women like I like my mace.

Thicc and horny.

Oops,
Maybe another day ;-;

I like my women how I like my music

{{champion:61}}
techno?
Heavy and metal
oh i didnt think oriana was that heavy
She is a 5-6 foot tall piece of metal.  My guess is that if she were real, she would weigh at least 500 lbs.

Thick doesn't mean attractive. 

Kayle is just a bombshell if I've ever seen one. A true atomic blonde.
Attractiveness is subjective to the individual; for example some guys like jinx, others like miss fortune, ext. Though for the post I was expecting it to feature camille lol.
